messages.subject: late registration Live and Learn
messages.msgSnippet: The Blue Ridge Assembly just informed me that we can take a few late registrations. If you or anyone you know wants to come to the conference, please forward
messages.messageBody:
The Blue Ridge Assembly just informed me that we can take a few late
registrations.

If you or anyone you know wants to come to the conference, please
forward Pam Genant (OFF-list : genant2@...) the following
information. She will give the the amount to be paid via PayPal.

name
email addy
full snail mail addy
phone number
names and ages of all family members

I'm so glad they agreed to accept last minute additions!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
________________________________________________________________________
Email and AIM finally together. You've gotta check out free AOL Mail! -
http://mail.aol.com
